column4: Would it be possible to allow Ubuntu to install to all of my free space and then re-size its partition again after installation to allow more space for my other partitions again?
look for the manual partitioning, you can set it up as you like
is that free space on the ntfs partition, or free space outside the ntfs partition?
then you need to resize the ntfs first. If you are using vista, use the disk management tool in vista to do that
